version_description:
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Other recent updates:
- Introducing an all new way to discover and search Meetup events in the first tab. Bottom line—it’s easier than ever.

As always, we love hearing your feedback: iossupport@meetup.com

As always, we love hearing your feedback: iossupport@meetup.com

- You can now publicly talk to everyone in your Meetup group.

- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

As always, we love hearing your feedback: iossupport@meetup.com

- A fix for some missing translated strings.
- A fix for crashes that some users were seeing on the Updates tab.

- In trying to fix a crash that some people were seeing, we introduced a crash that more people were seeing. We hate when this happens and we apologize. In this version, we think that all those crashes won't happen any more.

Other recent updates:
- You can now publicly talk to everyone in your Meetup group.

As always, we love hearing your feedback: iossupport@meetup.com

We’re always making improvements so Meetup works better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features.

We’ve rearranged the app to make it easier to keep track of your groups and stay in touch.

· Easily access your Meetup groups from your Home tab
· Keep track of your upcoming and saved events with your calendar view
· Discover and search for your next Meetup from the Explore tab
· Quickly access your Notifications and Messages from your Meetup groups

As always, we love hearing your feedback: iossupport@meetup.com

In this release: Sharing a group or event through Facebook Messenger is working again (after a long holiday of not working much at all), and messaging on Meetup is working better than before. And some under-the-hood fixes and improvements.


App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

The latest: A quick bug fix that makes it possible for members to share event feedback when prompted on the home screen.

App feedback is always welcome too: iossupport@meetup.com

In this release, we've made stability and performance improvements, and fixed a bug that was causing member photos to display inconsistently.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We’re always making improvements so Meetup works better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features.

As always, we love hearing your feedback: iossupport@meetup.com

We’re always making improvements so Meetup works better for you. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

As always, we love hearing your feedback: iossupport@meetup.com

The latest: A quick bug fix that makes it possible for members to share event feedback when prompted on the home screen.

App feedback is always welcome too: iossupport@meetup.com

If you had trouble finding the button that lets you message event hosts, it's back in this version. We've also addressed several bugs related to viewing, adding, and deleting photos.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

In this release, we've made stability and performance improvements, and fixed a bug that was causing member photos to display inconsistently.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

The crashing that was happening on iOS 10 and iOS 12 should be much better in this version. We also took care of two very annoying bugs: one that appeared to unsave your saved events and another that told you that a profile photo was required, even if you had one.


If you're still experiencing issues or have feedback to share, please let us know: iossupport@meetup.com

The latest version includes stability and performance improvements, along with some bug fixes, to keep things running smoothly.


App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Improvements in this release: We've sorted out some issues you may have experienced when writing event comments or signing up with Google.


App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

In this release: Sharing a group or event through Facebook Messenger is working again (after a long holiday of not working much at all), and messaging on Meetup is working better than before. And some under-the-hood fixes and improvements.


App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Picture this: Events now display a featured photo (if they have one). And if you're an organizer, you can finally use the app to add, change, or remove a featured photo when creating or editing your event.


App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We've updated the overall look and feel of the app with some color and font changes. (No changes to any functionality.)


App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Ever have trouble searching for an existing group in your messages? With this release, you should be able to find and continue your group conversations consistently. We've also taken care of some bug fixes and performance improvements.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

If you had trouble accessing the Explore tab, it's now working!

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Ever have trouble searching for an existing group in your messages? With this release, you should be able to find and continue your group conversations consistently. We've also taken care of some bug fixes and performance improvements.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Creating a new Meetup group sometimes takes a little time. You can now start the process on the go and finish it later—your progress is saved automatically. Setting a start and end time for collecting event RSVPs is also back in working condition.


App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Upload all the photos! You can now upload Live Photos taken with your phone's Camera app (alas they will be normal photos once uploaded, not animated). We've also fixed an issue showing an error message when viewing some notifications, and another bug preventing organizers from saving changes to RSVP start and end times.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Organizers: Just because you've temporarily changed timezones doesn't mean your event should. So, we fixed a bug that was unexpectedly shifting event times when text edits were made from a different timezone. We also squashed a number of smaller bugs and glitches affecting both members and organizers.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

In this update we squashed some bugs and made a few changes to prepare for iOS 13. Bugs fixed include: a misleading bug that prevented links to specific photos in an album from working properly; a flaky bug where message history would not be properly loaded between an organizer and member; a bug bug that would result in pasting a link twice when sharing an event; and finally an unnecessary bug which would result in an event you've indicated you're not attending stubbornly remaining highlighted on the Home screen.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

The latest version includes improvements for iOS 13 compatibility, along with some bug fixes to keep things running smoothly.

Did we miss something? App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We hate crashes as much as you do. So, we squashed some pesky bugs that were causing the app to crash. We also fixed a bug that was keeping you from viewing your group profile, and one that was causing attendee lists to load improperly.

Did we miss something? App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We love when people share photos from their events, but hate when we accidentally get in the way of that. So, we squashed a couple pesky bugs related to uploading and commenting on photos. We also fixed an issue where we were showing the wrong date for when RSVPs were scheduled to open, and one where editing the location of a copied event caused the app to crash.

Thanks for using Meetup!

Did we miss something? App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We hate crashes as much as you do. So, we squashed some pesky bugs that were causing the app to crash. We also fixed a bug that was keeping you from viewing your group profile, and one that was causing attendee lists to load improperly.

Did we miss something? App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We love when people share photos from their events, but hate when we accidentally get in the way of that. So, we squashed a couple pesky bugs related to uploading and commenting on photos. We also fixed an issue where we were showing the wrong date for when RSVPs were scheduled to open, and one where editing the location of a copied event caused the app to crash.

Thanks for using Meetup!

Did we miss something? App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We love when people share photos from their events, but hate when we accidentally get in the way of that. So, we squashed a couple pesky bugs related to uploading and commenting on photos. We also fixed an issue where we were showing the wrong date for when RSVPs were scheduled to open, and one where editing the location of a copied event caused the app to crash.

Thanks for using Meetup!

Did we miss something? App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We made it easier to find the right event for you. When viewing any event, you can now see similar events that are most like it. We also made some accessibility improvements throughout the app. And of course, we fixed a few bugs, including an issue with the tab bar hiding the comments input field after dismissing the keyboard.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

For this release, we spent some time squashing bugs and making improvements throughout the app.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We cleaned up a few inconsistencies and bugs. Including a bug in iOS 13, which was preventing users from logging in via Facebook with the Facebook app installed.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Meetup now includes the option to add a video conference link to an event instead of a location during the coronavirus advisory.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

The latest version includes some improvements to online event support, as well as stability and performance improvements to keep things running smoothly.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Don’t be late (or early)! The details for each event now include the time zone it's taking place in, so you’ll know when it’s actually happening no matter where you might be joining from. We also fixed a problem where actions were not visible while browsing photos, and restored the ability to report a group.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We’re always making improvements so Meetup works better for you. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

As always, we love hearing your feedback: iossupport@meetup.com

This release includes some under-the-hood improvements to keep things running smoothly.

This release fixes an issue where online event video links weren’t properly launching if there was a trailing space in the link entered. (And the usual under-the-hood improvements.)

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

This release fixes an issue where online event video links weren’t properly launching if there was a trailing space in the link entered. (And the usual under-the-hood improvements.)

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

This release fixes an occasional glitch with saving events and the usual under-the-hood improvements to keep things running smoothly.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

This release includes more under-the-hood improvements to keep things running smoothly.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Sharing via the system share sheet to LinkedIn was acting funny, but it’s behaving professionally again. We’ve also got the usual under-the-hood improvements and stability fixes.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We fixed some annoying bugs. The search bar was acting up and playing hide and seek so we fixed that and it is now persistently visible. The bottom navigation bar is now properly translated for all supported languages.

We’ve also got the usual under-the-hood improvements and stability fixes.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

This release includes some under-the-hood improvements to keep things running smoothly.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

For those of you who use a slightly bigger font size on your device, we've tweaked things so you don't have HUGE fonts when you only wanted things a little bit bigger. And we've got "general improvements and fixes" as usual.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

This release is on the small side. Only one bug fix... but thats because Dark Mode is coming!

Bug fixes:
- having the event comment field hidden made it hard to leave comments :-( so we fixed that!

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

This release includes some under-the-hood improvements to keep things running smoothly.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Dark Mode is here! Thanks for your comments and feedback about this feature. We're glad to roll out this feature making Meetup easier on your eyes and your phone's battery. Thank you for your patience and please keep sending comments and feedback.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

This update makes sure that all event times are shown in your local time zone.

Bug fixes:
- Some colors from Dark Mode were off so we fixed them.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Be our guest! You can now browse our app for Meetup events and groups without logging in or creating an account.
Also included in this release: clarifications around the time/timezone of events and a fix for a bug that caused the bottom of attendee lists to get cut off.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We’ve updated our app to optimize it for iOS 14.

We introduced the ability to filter your event searches by distance, date and event type. It's time to spend less time searching and more time attending great events!

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We've done a technical overhaul of our home tab - the changes are mostly under-the-hood but you might notice a few visual improvements.

This release includes some under-the-hood improvements to keep things running smoothly.

This release removes support for iOS 12. Limiting the number of iOS versions we support enables us to provide a higher quality iOS experience. We’ve also made some under-the-hood improvements to keep things running smoothly.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

This release fixes an issue that could prevent members from sending an RSVP for events with questions.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

This release includes some under-the-hood improvements to keep things running smoothly.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

You now have more options for filtering and finding relevant events. This release also includes some improvements and fixes that will help the app run more smoothly.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We fixed the bug where the notification badge does not clear even when the page is refreshed. You are also now able to share your favorite events with your friends directly from the event cards!

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

Meetup is now more accessibility friendly, screen readers are now able to read buttons a lot easier. We will continue to improve our app to be more accessible in the coming future. There are also now more comprehensive error messages.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We fixed some bugs related to the calendar so it should work more smoothly now and we continued to make the app more accessible for everyone's use. We are building up to something though...

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com

We crushed some bugs in this release that should enhance all members' user experience, we also made some minor UI/UX adjustments. Something big is coming though and we are so excited to show you in the coming weeks.

App feedback is always welcome: iossupport@meetup.com
